to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format

far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
Kaiyuan county level city in Honghe Hani and Yi autonomous prefecture, Yunnan

sentences.english: She stood there until his car was out of sight.
sentences.chinese: 她一直站在那里，直到他的车开远看不见了。

sentences.english: South Kaiyuan hole located at the Kaiyuan city south under approximately 10 kilometers high mountain ridges.
sentences.chinese: 开远南洞位于开远市南约10公里的崇山峻岭之下。

sentences.english: South Kaiyuan hole located at the Kaiyuan city south under approximately 10 kilometers high mountain ridges.
sentences.chinese: 开远南洞位于开远市南约10公里的崇山峻岭之下。

sentences.english: He got in his car and drove away while I stood there, unmoving .
sentences.chinese: 我呆呆地站在那里，看着他坐进车里直到车开远。

sentences.english: The present situation of odor pollution in Kaiyuan is introduced, and the countermeasures are put forward.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了开远市恶臭污染现状，提出了防治对策。

sentences.english: At night, the bright Kaiyuan City not far away contrast sharply with the dark villages like two worlds.
sentences.chinese: 晚上，不远处的开远城与漆黑的村寨成了两个世界。
